description: This Dart source file defines an application-wide theme configuration for Flutter, specifically implementing a custom Material 3 theme with specific color schemes and stylings for UI components such as AppBar, Card, Buttons, Inputs, and more. It encapsulates theme customization logic within the `AppTheme` class providing a `lightTheme` getter.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static access to a customized Flutter Material 3 theme for consistent styling across an app.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a `ThemeData` object configured with a custom color scheme and component styles following the Ocean Professional Material 3 design.
